entry.title: For MSSQL2000, a row cannot exceed the size of a page, which is 8KB - overhead i.e. 8060 bytes. 8KB is the size of a continuos disk space for storing, read and writing data.
entry.content: For MSSQL2000, a row cannot exceed the size of a page, which is 8KB – overhead i.e. 8060 bytes. 8KB is the size of a continuos disk space for storing, read and writing data.
